com.ning.billing.lifecycle

Interface KillbillService

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    AccountService, AnalyticsService, BeatrixService, BusService, CatalogService, EntitlementService, InvoiceService, MeterService, OSGIService, OverdueService, PaymentService, ServerService, TenantService
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultAccountService, DefaultAnalyticsService, DefaultBeatrixService, DefaultBusService, DefaultCatalogService, DefaultInvoiceService, DefaultMeterService, DefaultOSGIService, DefaultOverdueService, DefaultPaymentService, DefaultServerService, DefaultTenantService, Engine

    public interface KillbillService
    The interface KillbillService represents a service that will go through the Killbill lifecyle.

    A KillbillService can register handlers for the various phases of the lifecycle, so that its proper initialization/shutdown sequence occurs at the right time with regard to other KillbillService.
